  • Virtual hacking labs review

    So in my attempt to prep for OSCP I spent a while googling ways to prep for the OSCP and that is where I came across FalconSpy's review of VHL link HERE after some minor research online (you can tell that my prep for the OSCP so far has drilled in to me that you should research things you find) I found a lot of positive reviews about VHL so I decided to buy a month and at £100 if I didn't like it at least I would get access to a detailed PDF that would give me some extra knowledge.
